meanings.definition: Not practical or useful in real situations.
meanings.sent1: The nonpractical toy was too fragile to play with.
meanings.sent2: Her nonpractical ideas often led to interesting discussions.
meanings.sent3: The nonpractical umbrella had holes that made it more of a shower hat.
meanings.sent4: His nonpractical approach to gardening involved planting plastic flowers.
meanings.sent5: The nonpractical solution to the puzzle only made it more confusing.

meanings.definition: Not involving or concerned with practical matters.
meanings.sent1: The nonpractical art piece focused on emotions rather than function.
meanings.sent2: She preferred nonpractical conversations about dreams and fantasies.
meanings.sent3: The nonpractical clock had no numbers, making it more of a decoration.
meanings.sent4: His nonpractical advice on finances involved spending all savings on wishes.
meanings.sent5: The nonpractical approach to problem-solving often led to creative solutions.
